account_not_found: No results found with this filter
description: Monitor seat usage and the activity of users in your Zero Trust organization.
description_user_registry_identity: Gateway uses this identity when doing policy checks. This is the last-seen identity that is stored in the User Registry.
description_user_session_identity: Session identities are the identities stored from the login event.
empty_state_description: Users will be listed here once they initiate a session with Zero Trust.
empty_state_documentation_text: In the meantime, here’s our {link} about Users.
remove_multiple_users_description: Continuing will remove the seats of selected user(s) and invalidate their active sessions and devices. To prevent user(s) from accessing your Zero Trust organization, update any policies that allow them to authenticate.
remove_multiple_users_description_with_w:
Continuing will remove the seats of selected user(s) and invalidate their active sessions and devices. To prevent user(s) from accessing your Zero Trust organization, update any policies that allow them to authenticate.

You are attempting to remove one or more users who have already been removed.
remove_session_failure: Error removing user sessions and devices.
remove_session_success: Successfully removed user sessions and devices.
revoke_multiple_users_description: Continuing will terminate active sessions and log out devices of the selected user(s). Revoked users will still maintain an active seat in your Zero Trust organization.
revoke_session_failure: Error revoking user session and devices.
revoke_session_success: Successfully revoked user sessions and devices.
table_description: View your users’ devices and activity and revoke active sessions.
title: Users
